features: 【All in 1 Phone Tripod Stand】One-piece body design, enables three main functions of Selfie, Group Photos, and Live Broadcast are highly integrated into FOXOLA selfie stick tripod; The self-locking mechanism can be folded, compact structure, lightweight and easy to store, nearly without taking up any space. Intimately designed Hooks and Lanyards, easy to hang or carry, just live broadcast anytime and anywhere!

【61'' Adjustable Telescopic Pole】Made of Aluminum Alloy, corrosion-resistant, sturdy and durable, not easy to shake; The height of the cell phone tripod can adjust from 11.4 to 61 inches via 7-stage, offers you to capture a broader field of view, and satisfies your needs in different occasions.

【Reinforced Non-slip Tripod Base】Covered with high-quality non-slip silicone pad on the tripod base, and reinforced Umbrella-structure connecting rods, expanded into oversized triangular legs, greatly improved stability when stand-use in the flat land, comprehensive care for your phone.

【Detachable Wireless Remote Shutter】With a separate remote control, mobile phone compatibility is as high as 98%. Wireless connection is convenient and fast to One-key Shoot, max support 10m. When not in use, just place it onto the tripod to avoid being lost.

【Angle Rotation, Easy Operation】Featured with 180-degree horizontal and vertical dual-screen rotation stability, FOXOLA tripod of phone makes you to easily take the best photos, just Show Your Beauty at Will! The Top of phone holder convex up, extremely simple to pull the pole out; Hollow structure of double-sided spring clip to easily held in/out and protect the phone's side keys; Delicate Skin Texture of handle, beautiful, non-slip and sweat-proof, very stable to hold. The perfect essential travel accessories to you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Warm Tips: (1) To qulicky and easily unfold the tripod base, hold the top with your one hand , then buckle and open the base with your another-hand thumb. (2) To qulicky and easily open the battery cover of remote controller, just need to use the pliers to open it according to the pointed direction. The battery is enough to take 20000 photos, without need to replace the battery frequently. (3) The extendable bar of selfie stick tripod is made of aluminum alloy, please do not pull and drag vigorously rudely. (4) For more information, please refer to the online user manual or consult us direct.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile Marvel for Capturing Every Moment
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 61" Phone Tripod & Selfie Stick, and it has quickly become an indispensable tool in my photography and videography arsenal. This all-in-one device is a game-changer for anyone who loves capturing moments on their phone or is looking to film content for Tiktok/Instagram.The multi-functional design, combining a tripod and selfie stick, makes this product versatile and high quality. Whether I'm looking for the perfect angle for a content video or need a stable base for group photos, this product delivers. The adjustable phone holder accommodates various phone sizes securely, and the 360-degree rotation capability ensures I can capture shots from any angle.Another noteworthy feature is the Bluetooth remote control that comes with the tripod. This handy accessory eliminates the need for a timer and allows for seamless, hands-free operation. The remote has a decent range and works flawlessly, giving me the freedom to experiment with creative shots without any hassle.The tripod's stability is commendable, even when fully extended. I've used it outdoors in slightly uneven terrain, and the tripod has held its ground, providing a stable platform for my phone. I've used other tripods who made it such a pain to extend the tripod, and to properly stabilize the phone at the right angle, but this design makes it easy. It's been a gamechanger.In conclusion, the 61" Phone Tripod & Selfie Stick is a fantastic investment for anyone passionate about mobile photography and videography. Its durable build, versatile design, and thoughtful features make it a standout product in its category. I highly recommend it to fellow enthusiasts who want a reliable, all-in-one solution for capturing those special moments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A superior quality phone tripod stand for selfies & video recording!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Got this for my home video-making needs. Overall, I loved this phone tripod for its quality. Superior built and comes as a complete combo. Functions very well too and is highly recommended to anyone. Looks wise also it is nice with a black matte finish.My 2 cents below:Pros:- Height extends from 11.4 to 61 inches & is very helpful to adjust as per your photography needs- The phone clamp can extend width-wise, so it should fit any small/medium/large phone device even when a case is on- Clamp has a strong grip & easy to operate overall- Tripod is very sturdy & stable overall on the floor while using- Has dedicated buttons in the Bluetooth remote. I have iPhone & the button works- Rugged material and a nice finish that gives a great look overall- Well built product & feels durable- When folded, it is a small form factor product and hence great for portability reasons too- Very reasonably priced (Got for ~$19 including taxes) for the quality & the featureCons:- None that I see for this price & the quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First I’d like to thank @ErinOnDemand for the suggestion of this Tripod. It’s very sleek and compact. I haven’t used it yet because it was just delivered on 1/24/24 however I did open it to review the product. It appears to be durable. Strong legs which are great and it comes with a remote.I will come back to update once I use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great! Only a few things could be better
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Easy to setup, the remote works great, pretty sturdy, very lightweightCons:It must sit on even ground since you can’t change the length of the legs and I wish the phone mount had a little more range in motionOverall, it’s been a good buy! I mostly use it in our kitchen for cooking videos and it’s great for that, it’s just been a little harder to use for taking on hikes/getting outdoors content.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bigger than expected
reviews.reviewText: Really not a discrete size but super easy to pair and good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AWESOME FOR content creators
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my wife because for 1, she wanted it and for 2, I didn't have to hold her phone anymore. It's light weight and extends out just as high as a regular tripod. It accommodates her iPhone 14 pro plus and my S22 without issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The New Kind Of Tripod
reviews.reviewText: First of all, the build quality of this tripod is superb. It's made from high-grade materials that feel sturdy and durable in your hands. You can tell just by holding it that this is a tripod that's built to last.But it's not just the build quality that's impressive - the design of this tripod is also top-notch. It's easy to set up and adjust, so you can get the perfect shot every time. And the tripod head is incredibly smooth, which makes it a joy to use.One of the things I love about this tripod is how versatile it is. It's great for everything from landscape photography to portrait photography to video work. And because it's so sturdy, you can trust it to keep your camera steady even in windy conditions.Another great feature of this tripod is how lightweight it is. It's easy to carry around with you, whether you're hiking to a remote location or just taking a stroll through the city. And because it's so compact when folded up, it doesn't take up much space in your bag.Overall, I can't recommend the FOXOLA tripod enough. It's a fantastic piece of equipment that will make your photography and videography work so much easier and more enjoyable. If you're looking for a tripod that's reliable, versatile, and built to last, this is the one to get!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but heavy
reviews.reviewText: I bought for my upcoming travel trip. It was very long and heavy for my preference. Pretty but bulky for my style.

I bought this as a gift for my son and he loves it! It feels durable and does everything it claims to do. Setting up the Bluetooth remote is very easy and a great feature. It's not too heavy to use as a selfie stick and it has great extension.

reviews.reviewTitle: This phone tripod is great to use and really cool
reviews.reviewText: I wish I got this ages ago. It is very compact and travels very well. I love how cool looking it is and how it impresses everyone as it expands into the perfect height to take selfies or group photos. It is very sturdy and well made. The remote paired very easily with my Samsung phone and has great range. It holds the phone firmly either horizontally or vertically and I definitely recommend this product.
Me encantó practico y elegante sobre todo pequeño y fácil de llevar en mis cosas de viaje.

reviews.reviewTitle: Impressive Quality and Convenience with the FOXOLA 37.8" Selfie Stick Tripod
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the FOXOLA 37.8" Selfie Stick Tripod and have been extremely satisfied with my purchase. The tripod is made of high quality materials and feels very sturdy and durable. The extendable design is also very convenient, allowing me to easily adjust the length of the tripod to get the perfect shot.One of the features that I love most about this tripod is the wireless remote shutter. It makes taking selfies and group photos so much easier, as I can snap the photo without having to press the button on my phone. The remote also works great for taking photos or videos at a distance, which is perfect for vlogging.I also appreciate the 360° rotation feature, which allows me to easily adjust the angle of the phone to get the perfect shot. This is especially useful for capturing unique perspectives and creative shots.Overall, I am extremely happy with my purchase of the FOXOLA 37.8" Selfie Stick Tripod. It is a high quality, convenient, and versatile tool that I would recommend to anyone in need of a reliable tripod for their phone.
